title: Kiss Before Dying
description: Vampire Lord Sebastian Arsov is everything Katja has ever wanted. Unfortunately, after ten years of servitude as his blood slave, she’s being returned to mortal society. In order to experience a night in his bed she decides to make the ultimate sacrifice. Disguised by a hint of magic, Katja enters Sebastian’s chambers to immerse herself in pleasures she’s been long denied. Before the sun rises, she’ll discover what it’s like to be loved by the man who’s weaved his way into her heart, mind, body and soul—even as she succumbs to the bite that will end her life.A Romantica® paranormal erotic romance from Ellora’s CavePublisher’s Note: This story was previously published elsewhere as A Kiss Before Dying (under J.A. Saare), and has been revised for Ellora’s Cave.
author: Aline Hunter
